Records stop constantly. I tried it in Madeira and I thought the issue was because GPS could be lost in the mountains, but today I used it in barcelona city center and from a 9 km trekk it stopped 5 times. I had to be constantly opening the app to restart the recording. Battery has no restrictions so that was not the issue, it keeps saying low GPS (even other apps work fine and I am in Barcelona urban area). Also battery goes down very fast with this app, u couldn't use it for a 5 hours trekk.

Long story short, search for a mountain bike trail, seen one that had good reviews, only to arrive there and be a hiking trail, I don't complain, but after hiking with my bike in my back for 1h20 minutes because the trails wasn't suitable for mountain bike, you can imagine how great it felt. Ultimately I could have done more investigation on that trail but, well it was rated as mtb so I just decided to give it a go. I must say it was a good training. Drains battery like a madman, after 1h50 in the trail, I've seen my Galaxy S9 going from 100% battery to 0%, as a backup I always have my other phone with me and used Google Maps to find my way back, if I didn't I would easily be lost in the middle of no where, this is a big no no for this app. Honestly, big disappointment, the app should rate hiking specific trails as mtb, I still manage to have fun after all of this.

Records stop constantly. I tried it in Madeira and I thought the issue was because GPS could be lost in the mountains, but today I used it in barcelona city center and from a 9 km trekk it stopped 5 times. I had to be constantly opening the app to restart the recording. Battery has no restrictions so that was not the issue, it keeps saying low GPS (even other apps work fine and I am in Barcelona urban area). Also battery goes down very fast with this app, u couldn't use it for a 5 hours trekk.

Long story short, search for a mountain bike trail, seen one that had good reviews, only to arrive there and be a hiking trail, I don't complain, but after hiking with my bike in my back for 1h20 minutes because the trails wasn't suitable for mountain bike, you can imagine how great it felt. Ultimately I could have done more investigation on that trail but, well it was rated as mtb so I just decided to give it a go. I must say it was a good training. Drains battery like a madman, after 1h50 in the trail, I've seen my Galaxy S9 going from 100% battery to 0%, as a backup I always have my other phone with me and used Google Maps to find my way back, if I didn't I would easily be lost in the middle of no where, this is a big no no for this app. Honestly, big disappointment, the app should rate hiking specific trails as mtb, I still manage to have fun after all of this.

Records stop constantly. I tried it in Madeira and I thought the issue was because GPS could be lost in the mountains, but today I used it in barcelona city center and from a 9 km trekk it stopped 5 times. I had to be constantly opening the app to restart the recording. Battery has no restrictions so that was not the issue, it keeps saying low GPS (even other apps work fine and I am in Barcelona urban area). Also battery goes down very fast with this app, u couldn't use it for a 5 hours trekk.

Long story short, search for a mountain bike trail, seen one that had good reviews, only to arrive there and be a hiking trail, I don't complain, but after hiking with my bike in my back for 1h20 minutes because the trails wasn't suitable for mountain bike, you can imagine how great it felt. Ultimately I could have done more investigation on that trail but, well it was rated as mtb so I just decided to give it a go. I must say it was a good training. Drains battery like a madman, after 1h50 in the trail, I've seen my Galaxy S9 going from 100% battery to 0%, as a backup I always have my other phone with me and used Google Maps to find my way back, if I didn't I would easily be lost in the middle of no where, this is a big no no for this app. Honestly, big disappointment, the app should rate hiking specific trails as mtb, I still manage to have fun after all of this.

Records stop constantly. I tried it in Madeira and I thought the issue was because GPS could be lost in the mountains, but today I used it in barcelona city center and from a 9 km trekk it stopped 5 times. I had to be constantly opening the app to restart the recording. Battery has no restrictions so that was not the issue, it keeps saying low GPS (even other apps work fine and I am in Barcelona urban area). Also battery goes down very fast with this app, u couldn't use it for a 5 hours trekk.

Long story short, search for a mountain bike trail, seen one that had good reviews, only to arrive there and be a hiking trail, I don't complain, but after hiking with my bike in my back for 1h20 minutes because the trails wasn't suitable for mountain bike, you can imagine how great it felt. Ultimately I could have done more investigation on that trail but, well it was rated as mtb so I just decided to give it a go. I must say it was a good training. Drains battery like a madman, after 1h50 in the trail, I've seen my Galaxy S9 going from 100% battery to 0%, as a backup I always have my other phone with me and used Google Maps to find my way back, if I didn't I would easily be lost in the middle of no where, this is a big no no for this app. Honestly, big disappointment, the app should rate hiking specific trails as mtb, I still manage to have fun after all of this.

Records stop constantly. I tried it in Madeira and I thought the issue was because GPS could be lost in the mountains, but today I used it in barcelona city center and from a 9 km trekk it stopped 5 times. I had to be constantly opening the app to restart the recording. Battery has no restrictions so that was not the issue, it keeps saying low GPS (even other apps work fine and I am in Barcelona urban area). Also battery goes down very fast with this app, u couldn't use it for a 5 hours trekk.

Long story short, search for a mountain bike trail, seen one that had good reviews, only to arrive there and be a hiking trail, I don't complain, but after hiking with my bike in my back for 1h20 minutes because the trails wasn't suitable for mountain bike, you can imagine how great it felt. Ultimately I could have done more investigation on that trail but, well it was rated as mtb so I just decided to give it a go. I must say it was a good training. Drains battery like a madman, after 1h50 in the trail, I've seen my Galaxy S9 going from 100% battery to 0%, as a backup I always have my other phone with me and used Google Maps to find my way back, if I didn't I would easily be lost in the middle of no where, this is a big no no for this app. Honestly, big disappointment, the app should rate hiking specific trails as mtb, I still manage to have fun after all of this.
